engChrName: Character flag test!
engSearchText: Character flag test!
jpnChrName: キャラflagテスト！
jpnSearchText: キャラflagテスト！

engChrName: Character flag test!
engSearchText: Character flag test!
jpnChrName: キャラflagテスト！
jpnSearchText: キャラflagテスト！

engChrName: Still, I've known him since we were kids, so I can assure you he's definitely not a bad guy.
engSearchText:
Still, I've known him since we were kids, so I can
assure you he's definitely not a bad guy.
jpnChrName: まあ、でも決して悪いヤツじゃないって事は、 幼馴染として言っておくわ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、でも決して悪いヤツじゃないって事は、
幼馴染として言っておくわ。

engChrName: He cares about his friends and he's always kind to his elders, so don't let appearances deceive you.
engSearchText:
He cares about his friends and he's always kind to his
elders, so don't let appearances deceive you.
jpnChrName: 仲間の面倒見はいいし、お年寄りにもなんやかんやで 親切なところもあるし、誤解はしないで欲しいわ。
jpnSearchText:
仲間の面倒見はいいし、お年寄りにもなんやかんやで
親切なところもあるし、誤解はしないで欲しいわ。

engChrName: U-Uhm, it's a pleasure to meet you!
engSearchText: U-Uhm, it's a pleasure to meet you!
jpnChrName: えっと、よろしくお願いします！
jpnSearchText: えっと、よろしくお願いします！

engChrName: U-Uhm, it's a pleasure to meet you!
engSearchText: U-Uhm, it's a pleasure to meet you!
jpnChrName: えっと、よろしくお願いします！
jpnSearchText: えっと、よろしくお願いします！

engChrName: Huh? Keep your nose out, old fart.
engSearchText: Huh? Keep your nose out, old fart.
jpnChrName: ハン？　すっこんでろよ、オッサン。
jpnSearchText: ハン？　すっこんでろよ、オッサン。

engChrName: Oh, Van, it's you! Make sure you're keeping on the straight and narrow, okay?
engSearchText:
Oh, Van, it's you! Make sure you're keeping on the
straight and narrow, okay?
jpnChrName: あ、ヴァンだー！ マットウに生きなきゃダメだぞっ！
jpnSearchText:
あ、ヴァンだー！
マットウに生きなきゃダメだぞっ！

engChrName: Oh, if it's not young Arkride. My daughter told me about your meeting with Aaron.
engSearchText:
Oh, if it's not young Arkride. My daughter told me
about your meeting with Aaron.
jpnChrName: おや、アークライド君ではないか。 アーロンと会えた件は娘からも聞いている。
jpnSearchText:
おや、アークライド君ではないか。
アーロンと会えた件は娘からも聞いている。

engChrName: That's what our worrisome Aaron is like at the moment, you see. A bit of a surprise, perhaps...
engSearchText:
That's what our worrisome Aaron is like at the
moment, you see. A bit of a surprise, perhaps...
jpnChrName: まあ、今私達が懸念している彼はあんな感じでね。 少々、驚いたかもしれないが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、今私達が懸念している彼はあんな感じでね。
少々、驚いたかもしれないが……

engChrName: I'm sorry that Aaron picked a fight with you this evening. He can be so stubborn...
engSearchText:
I'm sorry that Aaron picked a fight with you
this evening. He can be so stubborn...
jpnChrName: 夕方はアーロンが喧嘩吹っ掛けちゃった みたいでごめんね、あいつ意地っ張りだから……
jpnSearchText:
夕方はアーロンが喧嘩吹っ掛けちゃった
みたいでごめんね、あいつ意地っ張りだから……

engChrName: Well, the guy did turn out to be more rash than folks had led me to believe... but there's no denyin' his skills.
engSearchText:
Well, the guy did turn out to be more rash than folks
had led me to believe... but there's no denyin'
his skills.
jpnChrName: まあ、聞いていた以上の跳ね返りっぷりなのは わかったが……実力も確かだったな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、聞いていた以上の跳ね返りっぷりなのは
わかったが……実力も確かだったな。

engChrName: Can see why you guys are having a hard time dealin' with him.
engSearchText:
Can see why you guys are having a hard time dealin'
with him.
jpnChrName: あんた達がこの状況で扱いに困るのも 改めて納得がいった。
jpnSearchText:
あんた達がこの状況で扱いに困るのも
改めて納得がいった。

engChrName: Still, I've known him since we were kids, so I can assure you he's definitely not a bad guy.
engSearchText:
Still, I've known him since we were kids, so I can
assure you he's definitely not a bad guy.
jpnChrName: まあ、でも決して悪いヤツじゃないって事は、 幼馴染として言っておくわ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、でも決して悪いヤツじゃないって事は、
幼馴染として言っておくわ。

engChrName: He cares about his friends and he's always kind to his elders, so don't let appearances deceive you.
engSearchText:
He cares about his friends and he's always kind to his
elders, so don't let appearances deceive you.
jpnChrName: 仲間の面倒見はいいし、お年寄りにもなんやかんやで 親切なところもあるし、誤解はしないで欲しいわ。
jpnSearchText:
仲間の面倒見はいいし、お年寄りにもなんやかんやで
親切なところもあるし、誤解はしないで欲しいわ。

engChrName: We wouldn't have anything to do with him otherwise, I assure you.
engSearchText:
We wouldn't have anything to do with him
otherwise, I assure you.
jpnChrName: そうでなければ、私達も彼を 買うような事はしないからね。
jpnSearchText:
そうでなければ、私達も彼を
買うような事はしないからね。

engChrName: Anyone who's aiming for the top of Heiyue needs to have some degree of leadership skills, as well as knowledge of a broad range of topics.
engSearchText:
Anyone who's aiming for the top of Heiyue needs to
have some degree of leadership skills, as well as
knowledge of a broad range of topics.
jpnChrName: 黒月で活躍して上を目指すなら、ある程度の 統率力と視野の広さはあって然るべきだ。
jpnSearchText:
黒月で活躍して上を目指すなら、ある程度の
統率力と視野の広さはあって然るべきだ。

engChrName: Even my eldest son is studying abroad to broaden his horizons.
engSearchText:
Even my eldest son is studying abroad to broaden
his horizons.
jpnChrName: 私の長男でさえ、それを改めて見極めさせるために 国外留学で見識を広めさせているくらいだからね。
jpnSearchText:
私の長男でさえ、それを改めて見極めさせるために
国外留学で見識を広めさせているくらいだからね。

engChrName: Yeah, I try not to judge a book by its cover.
engSearchText: Yeah, I try not to judge a book by its cover.
jpnChrName: ええ、一応人となりは表面だけで 判断しない主義ですしね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、一応人となりは表面だけで
判断しない主義ですしね。

engChrName: I'll take that into consideration, then decide what I gotta do once I've gotten to the bottom of the things.
engSearchText:
I'll take that into consideration, then decide what I
gotta do once I've gotten to the bottom of the things.
jpnChrName: その辺りも含めて、見極めたうえで どうするかは判断しますよ。
jpnSearchText:
その辺りも含めて、見極めたうえで
どうするかは判断しますよ。

engChrName: Well, hopefully I'll get the chance to assess the situation up close before too long.
engSearchText:
Well, hopefully I'll get the chance to assess the
situation up close before too long.
jpnChrName: まあ、早いうちに近くで見極める 機会があると……何かと良さそうですがね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、早いうちに近くで見極める
機会があると……何かと良さそうですがね。

engChrName: Hah! As daring as you seem, I knew you'd be the sort to see things through carefully.
engSearchText:
Hah! As daring as you seem, I knew you'd be the sort
to see things through carefully.
jpnChrName: はは、やはり大胆に見えて慎重に ものを見通すスタンスは思った通りだな。
jpnSearchText:
はは、やはり大胆に見えて慎重に
ものを見通すスタンスは思った通りだな。

engChrName: Just as anticipated. Anyway, I'm counting on your help.
engSearchText:
Just as anticipated. Anyway, I'm counting on
your help.
jpnChrName: 見込んだ通りだ、改めてよろしく頼むよ。
jpnSearchText: 見込んだ通りだ、改めてよろしく頼むよ。
